This is one of the best games ever created. Even if there not lots of content unlike its sequel or most other games, simply the gameplay alone makes the game so good. portal fun
PORTAL IS AMAZING

Portal is the first puzzle game I played and I really enjoyed it. Everything it does  feels so deliberately crafted. How it builds upon existing knowledge whilst slowly introducing new mechanics. How rooms are designed to gently guide you towards the correct solution through layout and use of color. It makes you feel smart. The kinesthetics are also simply great; Messing around with the physics by using the Portal Gun is just fun.

This is complemented by some great writing and an interesting setting, the underlying narrative of which staying in the background for those who want to explore it further.

A timeless, classic puzzle game. Everyone on Steam should play this game.
It's short but sweet, I finished it in 4 hours and I'm not that great at puzzle games. 100% completion will take you roughly 10 hours I've heard.
It's mainly puzzles with a bit of platforming and combat, powered by the revolutionary and creative portal mechanics. There's a pretty interesting and thought-provoking story as well.
